MEGA_BOOST.DESCRIPTION: Unlock the ultimate visibility for your event with CrowdMeet Boost! Elevate your gathering to the top spot on our homepage and let us personally invite users who'll love what you've planned. It's not just a boost; it's your event's ticket to stardom!
MEGA_BOOST.BULLET_POINT_CONTENT_1: Your event takes the spotlight on our homepage.
MEGA_BOOST.BULLET_POINT_CONTENT_2: We'll send notifications to users who match the vibe and interest of your event
MEGA_BOOST.BULLET_POINT_CONTENT_3: Boosted events typically see higher engagement and RSVP rates
MEGA_BOOST.BULLET_POINT_CONTENT_4: Tailored recommendations mean the right crowd for your event
MEGA_BOOST.BULLET_POINT_CONTENT_5: Extend your event's reach beyond your immediate network for a diverse audience
